title: Bump dependencies to latest
description: User request (2025-12-04): bump all packages, reinstall, clean up, commit & push. Coordinate with other agents.

title: Remove route runtime config for cache components
description: Next.js 16 build with cacheComponents fails because many route handlers export const runtime = 'nodejs', which Turbopack disallows with cacheComponents. Need to remove runtime exports across API routes so build succeeds.

title: Fix build error: runtime reexport in notes API route
description: Vercel build (Next.js 16.0.5, Turbopack) fails: src/app/api/clients/[clientId]/notes/[noteId]/route.ts exports { runtime } from '../route', causing Next.js error 'runtime field mustn't be reexported'. Need to align with route segment config rules and restore build.

title: Complete next item in API route migration checklist
description: User request: find the next unchecked item in docs/api-route-migration-checklist.md, implement it using old server code in ../keepon-full as reference, and mark the item as completed.
